trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ016_02650_SEQ_00<tab>This hungry Hyur does not know where his next meal is coming from.
TEXT_STMBDZ016_02650_TODO_01<tab>Place the smoke bombs at the designated locations and disperse the midge clouds.

TEXT_STMBDZ016_02650_MAN02650_000_000<tab>Good <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evening)) ((morning)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((afternoon)) ((evening)) /var>)) /var>. Fancy helping me with an errand?
TEXT_STMBDZ016_02650_MAN02650_000_001<tab>I'd come here from Ala Gannha to buy food, but I was just told there's been no harvest here either.
TEXT_STMBDZ016_02650_MAN02650_000_002<tab>I thought I might see what wild plants I could pick up instead. However, the area I had my eye on is home to a swarm of midges.
TEXT_STMBDZ016_02650_MAN02650_000_003<tab>If you think you're up to it, I'd like to ask you to take care of these bugs. Meet me back in Ala Gannha if you're willing.
TEXT_STMBDZ016_02650_MAN02650_000_011<tab>As you're doubtless aware, insects aren't too fond of smoke. I decided to create smoke bombs to scare them off with the gunpowder we use for quarrying.
TEXT_STMBDZ016_02650_MAN02650_000_012<tab>Use them to deal with the creatures. You'll find them west of the village.
TEXT_STMBDZ016_02650_MAN02650_000_020<tab>Use the smoke bombs to deal with the creatures. You'll find them west of the village.
TEXT_STMBDZ016_02650_MAN02650_000_041<tab>Here's your reward for helping. I'll head off now to collect what plants I can.
